name: LensProcedure
title: Lens Procedure
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent types of lens procedures.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with procedures of the lens, including exchange of intraocular lens, removal or repositioning of lens or lens prosthesis.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Discission of secondary membranous cataract (opacified posterior lens capsule and/or anterior hyaloid); stab incision technique (Ziegler or Wheeler knife)
Repositioning of intraocular lens prosthesis, requiring an incision (separate procedure)
Removal of secondary membranous cataract (opacified posterior lens capsule and/or anterior hyaloid) with corneo-scleral section, with or without iridectomy (iridocapsulotomy, iridocapsulectomy)
Removal of lens material; pars plana approach, with or without vitrectomy

contains.display: Discission of secondary membranous cataract (opacified posterior lens capsule and/or anterior hyaloid); stab incision technique (Ziegler or Wheeler knife)
Repositioning of intraocular lens prosthesis, requiring an incision (separate procedure)
Removal of secondary membranous cataract (opacified posterior lens capsule and/or anterior hyaloid) with corneo-scleral section, with or without iridectomy (iridocapsulotomy, iridocapsulectomy)
Removal of lens material; pars plana approach, with or without vitrectomy
